statements: SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM demand_forecasting_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_description, report_date FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, LENGTH(report_description) AS description_length FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT report_id, UPPER(report_name) AS uppercase_name FROM demand_forecasting_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name AS title, DATE_FORMAT(report_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE report_description LIKE '%demand%' ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM demand_forecasting_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT id, report_name FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE id = 1;
SELECT report_name FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM demand_forecasting_reports JOIN demand_forecasting_data ON demand_forecasting_reports.id = demand_forecasting_data.report_id WHERE demand_forecast > 1000;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE id > 100;

SELECT report_name, demand_forecast FROM demand_forecasting_reports INNER JOIN demand_forecasting_data ON demand_forecasting_reports.id = demand_forecasting_data.report_id WHERE demand_forecast > 500;
SELECT MAX(demand_forecast) AS max_forecast, MIN(demand_forecast) AS min_forecast FROM demand_forecasting_data;
SELECT report_date, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM demand_forecasting_reports GROUP BY report_date HAVING total_reports > 1;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_reports;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE forecasted_demand > 1000;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sale_id, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold >= 50 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE forecasted_demand > 100;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 2 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecasting_reports WHERE forecasted_demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Demand_Data;
SELECT product_id, demand_amount FROM Demand_Data WHERE date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT product_name, category FROM Product_Info WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT sales_amount FROM Sales_Data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_id, quantity, location FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Demand_Data WHERE demand_amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Product_Info WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales, sales_channel FROM Sales_Data GROUP BY sales_channel ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT date, product_name, sales_amount FROM Sales_Data JOIN Product_Info ON Sales_Data.product_id = Product_Info.product_id WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM DemandForecastReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT location_name, address, region FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price, p.product_id, s.sale_date, s.quantity, s.total_amount FROM Products p INNER JOIN SalesData s ON p.product_id = s.product_id;
